channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours

item.title: [+3015] His wife ditches him but leaves wedding dress (revenge pics)
[+2516] 'No one's ever gonna believe you' (PIC)
[+2427] VIDEO: Lewis Black: Glenn Beck Has Nazi Tourette
item.description: On last night's Daily Show, Lewis Black devoted his entire Back in Black segment to Glenn Beck, juxtaposing a clip of the Fox host freaking out about people comparing Arizona to Nazi Germany with like a zillion clips of Beck comparing everything other than Arizona to Nazi Germany. You know who used to juxtapose Glenn Beck clips like that? Hitler!

item.title: [+1813] Worst Wedding DJ EVER!
[+1693] Zuckerberg: Friends Who Gave Me Private Info "Dumb F*cks"
item.description: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg and his company are suddenly facing a big new round of scrutiny and criticism about their cavalier attitude toward user privacy. An early instant messenger exchange Mark had with a college friend won't help put these concerns to rest.

item.title: [+1526] Parents Go Nuts While Passing Top Gear Crew (Video)
item.description: The O.G. Top Gear crew has been gallivanting around the streets and highways of England in plain sight for years. That doesn't mean it's any less special when Clarkson, Hammond and May are spotted in the wild, though.

item.title: [+1366] Flowchart to Determine if Barack Obama is a U.S. Citizen
item.description: Is Obama actually a U.S. Citizen? This flowchart will help us determine the truth, once and for all.

item.title: [+1262] 'Kill Your Facebook Page' Backlash Gains Speed
item.description: Calls for people to delete their Facebook accounts are gathering momentum. Critics cite privacy concerns and plummeting trust in the company and its leader, Mark Zuckerberg.

item.title: [+1225] What Really Happens When You Delete Your Facebook Account
[+1183] F-Word Protected by 1st Amendment? Answer: Fuck Yes
item.description: ACLU aggressively defends violators of Pennsylvania's swear laws . . . and wins.

item.title: [+1151] The Oil Spill Fix BP Doesn't Want You to Know About
item.description: Experts are trying to get the word out on the 700-million gallon supertanker solution that already worked in the Middle East (on a pill 65x the size of Exxon Valdez), and that might save the gulf.

item.title: [+1082] Portal is Free
item.description: "Steam for the Mac has been released, and Aperture Science couldn't be happier. Yesterday, millions of new recruits poured into the Aperture Science Enrichment Center for Portal testing. If they are ever found, we are sure they would want you to know that the wheels of science turn ever onward. Today, in an effort to restaff, Aperture Science ..."

[+798] Laura Bush: Gay Marriage & Abortion Should Be Legal (Video)
item.description: Former First Lady Laura Bush made a surprising tack away from two of the most definitive social issues of her husband's presidency this week, telling CNN's Larry King that she backs gay marriage and abortion rights.

item.title: [+696] Walking on the wild side: Photographer's stunning photos up
item.description: While he may look cuddly, it would take just a few swift movements for the tiger to swipe the photographer behind the lens with his huge paw. For he is lying just inches away from the majestic beast.

item.title: [+655] The 19 Most Hilariously Failed Attempts at Sexy Album Covers
